Anzac Day watch live: Dawn service times and locations, trading hours and weather https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/anzac-day-dawn-service-times-and-locations-trading-hours-and-weather/3IO3Y7CKPVBUVDOJBZWLPHJ2TQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/anzac-day-dawn-service-times-and-locations-trading-hours-and-weather/3IO3Y7CKPVBUVDOJBZWLPHJ2TQ/ Cherie HowieAuckland's dawn service is at 6am at the Auckland War Memorial Museum in the Domain. Wed, 24 Apr 2024 17:43:06 +0000 Kiwis around the country are commemorating our war dead, and the military service of those who did make it home, at Anzac Day ceremonies around the country this morning. Pictured is the scene at Mount Maunganui last year. File photo / Alex Cairns

Big tech names seek meeting with Minister Judith Collins as millions in funding is set to expire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/with-millions-in-funding-set-to-expire-big-tech-names-push-for-meeting-with-judith-collins/AYFF7HNI7RE6RD6LJ64SDWE5NE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/with-millions-in-funding-set-to-expire-big-tech-names-push-for-meeting-with-judith-collins/AYFF7HNI7RE6RD6LJ64SDWE5NE/ Chris Keall'Time is against us' in the cloud software sector's funding quest, tech leaders say. Wed, 24 Apr 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Technology Minister Judith Collins is in demand for meetings with execs at Xero and other cloud software firms, as the expiry of funding for a key initiative looms on June 30.
